refreshNewestPackageCache

public static void refreshNewestPackageCache(java.lang.Long channelId,
                                             java.lang.String label)
Refreshes the channel with the "newest" packages. Newest isn't just the latest versions, an errata could have obsoleted a package in which case this would have removed said package from the channel.

Parameters:
channelId - identifies the channel to be refreshed
label - the label

                                           java.lang.Long toChannelId)

Parameters:
fromChannelId - original channel id
toChannelId - cloned channle id
